Uses of Class
danbikel.parser.DecoderServer

  • Packages that use DecoderServer 
    Package Description
    danbikel.parser
    Provides the core framework of this extensible statistical parsing engine.

    • Uses of DecoderServer in danbikel.parser

      Methods in danbikel.parser that return DecoderServer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static DecoderServer Parser.getNewDecoderServer(String derivedDataFilename)
      Gets a new decoder server for when creating a stand-alone parsing client (i.e., a parsing client that creates its own DecoderServerRemote instance).
